description.text: You cause an object or location to emanate magical vibrations that attract either a specific kind of intelligent creature or creatures of a particular alignment, as defined by you. The particular kind of creature to be affected must be named specifically. A creature subtype is not specific enough. Likewise, the specific alignment must be named.

sections.Components: V, S, M (a drop of honey and crushed pearls worth 1,500 gp)
sections.Targets: one location (up to a 10-ft. cube/level) or one object
